text: Frederick William Dyke (December 27, 1922 – June 28, 2012) was a Canadian curler from Nova Scotia. He played as second on the 1951 Brier Champion team, skipped by Don Oyler.http://www.sportnovascotia.ca/hof/Inductees/Search/InducteeDetails/tabid/571/Default.aspx?m=215http://www.whitefamilyfuneralhome.com/obituaries/71731 ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:Canadian military personnel of World War II Category:1922 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Curlers from Nova Scotia Category:People from Kings County, Nova Scotia Category:People from Yarmouth, Nova Scotia Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Fred Dyke
